title: Michelle Keegan shows off her phenomenal figure in stunning bikini selfie on Dubai break
text:
She's never been afraid to show off her incredible figure.

And Michelle Keegan put her phenomenal physique on display as she stripped off for a stunning bikini selfie during her holiday in Dubai on Wednesday.

The 32-year-old actress looked incredible as she shared the cheeky black and white snap with her 4.1 million Instagram followers.

Sizzling: Michelle Keegan put her phenomenal physique on display as she stripped off for a stunning bikini selfie during her holiday in Dubai on Wednesday

Michelle put her tanned and toned figure on display in a scanty two-piece as she posed in front of a selection of mirrors.

Even in black and white, Michelle's abs were clear to see as she posed up a storm for the selfie.

She captioned the image with a ghost emoji, while fans went wild for the shot in the comments.

The struggle is real: Michelle took to her social media account on Tuesday to warn her followers against wearing Perspex shoes in a hot place

Earlier in the day, Michelle took to her social media account to warn her followers against wearing perspex shoes in a hot place.

The star bemoaned her swollen feet as she shared a picture of herself from the back of a cab, revealing she couldn't get her sweaty heels back on.

Michelle wrote: 'For those thinking about buying Perspex shoes, do not take them off in a hot country, they will NOT be going back on... #nogive'.

Ths Brassic actress looked gorgeous in the social media snap, wearing a black strappy dress and dazzling silver earrings.

Cocktail o'clock: She also revealed she had been keeping 'hydrated' thanks to a selection of piña coladas instead of water during her UAE getaway

She also revealed she had been keeping 'hydrated' thanks to a selection of piña coladas instead of water during her UAE getaway.

Michelle also posted an image of herself in a black and green bikini with a leaf design, that she captioned, 'just missing a Mojito'.

She wrapped a matching cover up around one shoulder as she lounged on a sandy beach while clutching a sun shading straw hat in one hand.

Her brunette tresses were left to naturally fall down her back and she wore no makeup as she grinned for the camera.

Fun in the sun: Michelle also posted an image of herself in a black and green bikini with a leaf design, that she captioned, 'just missing a Mojito'

In another post the former Coronation Street star posed in front of a brightly lit building as she showed off clothes from her new Very collection.

She captioned the image: 'Obviously I had to pack some of my favourite VeryUK pieces!'

Michelle wore a beige wide-legged trouser suit with a black sweetheart shaped top in the snap. For accessories she added golden hooped earrings.

Chic: In another post the former Coronation Street star posed in front of a brightly lit building as she showed off clothes from her new Very collection

The holiday comes after Michelle revealed that her mother is putting pressure on her to start a family with her husband Mark Wright.

The actress, who married Mark in 2015, joked she is 'not getting any younger' but was not yet ready to start a family during an interview on The Jonathan Ross Show.

When asked if babies are on the horizon, Michelle told the host: 'Not yet. Everyone always asks that question. Don't get me wrong, I'm not getting any younger. My mum is on it as well. No plans yet, but we definitely do want children in the future.'

She also spoke about how they managed to make their marriage work, while they had to live in different countries due to their careers.

'He got the job in LA while I was in Malaysia [filming Our Girl],' she said. 'We were apart for about 4 months. It was really tough...

'People said how did you deal with it and stuff. Thank god for FaceTime and things like that. You're on a countdown the whole time to just get home.'
description: She's never been afraid to show off her incredible figure. And Michelle put her phenomenal physique on display as she stripped off for a stunning bikini selfie during her holiday in Dubai on Wednesday.
